codex.title: Decrypt The Girl Codex
codex.description: Skeleton manifest for organizing nodes, chapters, rooms, and constellations within the AVC codex archive.

directories.name: nodes
directories.purpose: Reusable knowledge atoms that can be referenced by chapters, rooms, or constellations.

directories.name: chapters
directories.purpose: Linear narratives or scrolls composed from one or more nodes.

directories.name: rooms
directories.purpose: Interactive or spatial experiences that assemble nodes and chapters.

directories.name: constellations
directories.purpose: Curated collections linking nodes across thematic or temporal arcs.

directories.name: manifest
directories.purpose: Meta-documents describing how the codex is organized, including this index.

guidance: All paths are relative to the repository root and should remain stable for downstream tooling.
Each directory may contain additional metadata files describing its own contents as the codex evolves.
